import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default class PersonList extends React.Component { state = { name: '', First_Name:'', Last_Name: '', DOB: '', Country: '', Nationality: '', Email: '', Alternate_Email: '', Phone_no: '', Password: '' } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ name: event.target.value }); this.setState({ First_Name: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Last_Name: event.targetvalue}); this.setState({ DOB: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Country: event.target.Country.value}); this.setState({ Nationality: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Email: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Alternate_Email: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Phone_no: event.target.value}); this.setState({ Password: event.target.value}); } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const user = { name: this.state.name, First_Name: this.state.First_Name, Last_Name: this.state.Last_Name, DOB: this.state.DOB, Country: this.state.Country, Nationality: this.state.Nationality, Email: this.state.Email, Alternate_Email: this.state.Alternate_Email, Phone_no: this.state.Phone_no, Password: this.state.Password }; axios.post(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users`, { user }) .then(res => { alert('successful'); console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) } render() { return (
) } }
